stories.title: Show HN: I made it easy to create personalized pages

stories.text:
I know HN doesn't support categories or tagging (and would imagine there has been long and drawn out discussions about why not?) - but one thing that strikes me is that often the most interesting discussions on here are about things that aren't code-y in nature.

Has anyone given any thought about how to use the API to separate out discussion types (like this) at all? Or...is it just me that'd be interested in this?
stories.title: Ask HN: Topic Separation?
Is Bluetooth holding back Apple's AirPods? We asked the man who made them
Ancient dreams of intelligent machines: 3k years of robots
List of companies that had successful pivots
Elon Musk Meme Review – Lex Fridman

stories.text:
Happy New Year HN

First: Thanks for all great submissions and for all high quality and interesting comments from all you users here on HN.

Second: Do you have any plans for the new year, new skills to learn, excited over any new project, looking forward to something, should you do anything different this year, etc?

Personally I never had any "new year promises", neither this year, but I have at least a "goal/plan" this year, to do something different; Consume less, create/learn more. It is so easy just surf the web consuming stuff because you are bored, that in the end gives you nothing/little in the end. This year I will try to use more of my time to try to learn stuff that interest me or can be useful. I probably will fail miserably, but at least its a plan :) And now I have said it, on the internet, so best I stick to it :)

Once again Happy New Year
stories.title: HN: == Happy New Year HN == (What is your “plans” for the new year?)
